name: Keto Fathead Bread
author: timhuckaby
summary: This low- to net zero-carb bread can be used for bagels, pizza dough, and breakfast bread rolls.
directions: Place mozzarella cheese and cream cheese in a microwave-safe bowl
Microwave on high, 20 seconds at a time, until melted
Whisk egg in a bowl until beaten
Mix in almond flour, baking powder, and garlic powder until well combined
Work mozzarella mixture into the dough until sticky
Transfer the dough to a sheet of plastic wrap and fold plastic wrap over the dough
Gently work the dough into a ball
Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Grease a baking sheet or line with parchment paper
Remove dough from refrigerator and unwrap
Cut dough into 4 equal pieces and roll each piece into a ball
Cut each ball in 1/2 to form a top and bottom bun
Place dough, cut-sides down, on the prepared baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until golden and set up, 10 to 12 minutes
